DataElement.preferredDefinition: The procedure performed to identify an abnormal condition or atypical variations of structure and function of the body.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The activity of perceiving, discerning, discovering or identifying._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:No value exists.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
The act of perceiving, discerning, discovering, or identifying.

Property.preferredDefinition: A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

Concepts.definition: A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for TCGA per request by A.Janning and released per TCGA approval. mc 12/3/12

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The activity of perceiving, discerning, discovering or identifying._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

Concepts.definition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A character or string that represents the full name of the laboratory assessment.

Concepts.definition: A character or string that represents the full name of the laboratory assessment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated definition to match current NCIt. mc 4.23.19

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The activity of perceiving, discerning, discovering or identifying.:A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: The act of perceiving, discerning, discovering, or identifying.
A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ReferenceDocuments.name: MCL Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Mode of detection (i.e., imaging) should be indicated for incidental detection.
